text: Roppongi Station (六本木駅,ろっぽんぎえき) is a Railway station of Tokyo Metro and Toei Subway in Tokyo. There is an exit from the station into Roppongi Hills. ==Neighbor== ; Tokyo Metro : Hibiya Line :: Hiroo （H 03） - Roppongi （H 04） - Kamiyacho （H 05） ; Toei Subway : Oedo Line ::Azabu-juban （E 22） - Roppongi （E 23） - Aoyama-itchome （E 24） Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Roppongi Station
